name: postcss-sparrow-clamp-fallback

0.1.0.name: postcss-sparrow-clamp-fallback
0.1.0.description: A PostCSS plugin that creates fallback of clamp() for you.

scripts.build: spago bundle-module --main Helper --to src/utilities/_Helper.js; NODE_ENV=production npx rollup -c;
